titles.title: Veterans' Compensation Amendments of 1989
A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide for reassignment of certain Federal cases upon request of a party.

bill.summary: 3/2/1987--Introduced. Peremptory Challenge Act of 1987 - Amends the Federal judicial code to require the reassignment of a case to be tried in the U.S. Claims Court, a Federal district court, or a bankruptcy court to another judicial officer upon application of all parties on one side of a civil or criminal case. Sets guidelines for such reassignments.
